item.title: Using Docker and Kubernetes to produce a scalable fraud detection API
item.description: Using Docker and Kubernetes to produce a scalable fraud detection API -- /* Let inline verbatim have the same color as the surroundings */ code { color: inherit; background-color: transparent; } /* Let pre tags for code blocks have the same color as the surroundings */ pre { color: inherit; background-color: transparent; } /* Add scrollbar to dropdown menus in bootstrap navigation bar */ .dropdown-menu { height: auto; max-height: 400px; overflow-x: hidden; } /* Adds an invisible element before each target to offset for the navigation bar */ .
